about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our mission and vision
about.missionText: To provide a clean, distraction-free reading experience with focus on content quality and accessibility.
about.visionText: A world where information is easily accessible, well-organized, and presented in a user-friendly manner.
about.storyText1: BlogMinimalista was founded in 2023 with a simple goal: to create a blog platform that prioritizes content and user experience above all else.
about.storyText2: Our team consists of dedicated individuals who are passionate about clean design, accessibility, and quality content.
about.value1: Simplicity: We believe in removing unnecessary distractions to focus on what matters.
about.value2: Accessibility: Content should be accessible to everyone, regardless of device or ability.
about.value3: Quality: We prioritize well-researched, thoughtful content over quantity.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we protect your personal data
privacy.introText: At BlogMinimalista, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website.
privacy.collectionText: We may collect the following information:
privacy.collectionItem1: Personal information such as name and email address when you contact us
privacy.collectionItem2: Usage data such as pages visited and time spent on our website
privacy.collectionItem3: Technical data such as IP address, browser type, and device information
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacy.adsenseText: We use Google AdSense to display ads on our website. Google AdSense uses cookies to serve ads based on your previous visits to our website or other websites.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics to analyze site traffic. These services may collect information about your use of our website.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@blogminimalista.com.
